com.flurry.android.tumblr

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flurry.android.tumblr.Post
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhotoPost, TextPost

    public abstract class Post
extends Object
    Abstract base class for TextPost or PhotoPost. Please create an instance of TextPost or PhotoPost if you intend to post on Tumblr.
    Author:
    2009-2015 Flurry, Inc. All Rights Reserved
    See Also:
    Flurry Publisher Support Site

      • setPostListener

        public void setPostListener(PostListener listener)
        Sets the PostListener for your text/photo post. Listen to the onPostSuccess and onPostFailure callbacks to get the feedback.
        Parameters:
        listener - The PostListener instance to get the success/failure callbacks.
